creator: Griffin
prompt:
Build a clean, mobile-responsive site called **One Prompt Sites**  a minimal, SEO-optimized directory showcasing real websites built from a single AI prompt.

?? Data Source  
Fetch entries from:  
https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dgriff86/oneprompt-json-host/refs/heads/main/prompt1.json

Each JSON item includes:
{
  \"url\": \"...\",
  \"date\": \"2025-05-12\",
  \"creator\": \"...\",
  \"prompt\": \"...\",
  \"description\": \"...\",
  \"notes\": \"...\", // optional, show only if site is marked completed
  \"completed\": true
}

?? Display for each site (sorted newest first):  
- Title: clickable link (url), opens in new tab  
- Date: formatted like May 12, 2025  
- Creator name  
- Description (short, shown under title)  
- Toggle button: View Prompt  
  - Expands to show the full prompt (keep markdown and line breaks)  
  - If `completed` is true and `notes` exist, show notes below the prompt

?? Design & Styling  
- Background: #f8f9fa  
- Cards: white, soft shadows, large rounded corners  
- Accent color: dark gray or navy  
- Font: clean sans-serif (Inter, Helvetica Neue, system-ui)  
- Responsive grid layout that adapts to mobile and desktop  
- No gradients, no bright colors  keep it clean and neutral

?? Top of page  
- Title: One Prompt Sites  
- Subheading: Websites created with a single AI prompt.  
- Intro text:  
  Explore the creativity and power of one-prompt web creation. This directory highlights real sites built from a single AI promptfast, minimal, and AI-driven.

?? Other setup  
- Remove any default footer or contact sections  
- Replace the default favicon with something relevant (e.g. spark, AI icon)  
- Meta site description:  
  A showcase of websites created from a single AI prompt. Discover whats possible with one idea and zero code.
